thread.title: 'Fund managers need to stop chasing returns and start reshaping society'
thread.title_full: 'Fund managers need to stop chasing returns and start reshaping society'

author: Saker Nusseibeh
title: 'Fund managers need to stop chasing returns and start reshaping society'
text: Early stage investments? I've crunched the numbers and the odds are not good 'Fund managers need to stop chasing returns and start reshaping society' The Money Lab: No saver wants us to increase financial returns by 1pc or 2pc if they end up living in Gotham City, writes Saker Nusseibeh 'Unless one is a Baptist Creationist Republican, there is a growing acceptance that the world is rapidly and irrevocably progressing towards warming that will have catastrophic consequences,' says Saker Nusseibeh Photo: Reuters By Saker Nusseibeh
